definitions.definition: A tree growth in which the grain has grown in a deformed manner; a burr knot .
Wood of a mottled veneer , usually cut from such a growth.
A knot or lump in thread or cloth.

main_definition: A tree growth in which the grain has grown in a deformed manner; a burr knot .
secondary_definitions: Wood of a mottled veneer , usually cut from such a growth.
A knot or lump in thread or cloth.
